es.upm.dit.gsi.shanks.agent.capability.creation

Class CreationShanksAgentCapability

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.upm.dit.gsi.shanks.agent.capability.creation.CreationShanksAgentCapability

  • public class CreationShanksAgentCapability
extends Object
    Class to provide the capability of create a new shanks agent on simulation time, from any other shanks agent.
    Author:
    Alberto Mardomingo

      Adds an agent to the simulation
      static void removeAgent(ShanksSimulation sim, String agentID)
      "Removes" an agent with the given name from the simulation Be careful: what this actually do is to stop the agent execution.

      • addNewAgent

        public static void addNewAgent(ShanksSimulation sim,
                               ShanksAgent agent)
                        throws ShanksException
        Adds an agent to the simulation
        Parameters:
        sim - - The shanks simulation
        Agent - - The new agent
        Throws:
        DuplicatedAgentIDException
        ShanksException

      • removeAgent

        public static void removeAgent(ShanksSimulation sim,
                               String agentID)
                        throws ShanksException
        "Removes" an agent with the given name from the simulation Be careful: what this actually do is to stop the agent execution.
        Parameters:
        sim - -The Shanks Simulation
        agentID - - The name of the agent to remove
        Throws:
        ShanksException - An UnkownAgentException if the Agent ID is not found on the simulation.
